content: these glorious lacy ankle crochet socks are such a treat to make and wear worked from the toe up the foot and ankle feature a delicate lace look crochet cable stitch with a subtle ribbing at the top and a study heel added they are perfect for both comfort and style to fit feet size us 6-10/uk 4-8 but with information for adjusting for bigger or smaller feet these crochet socks make the perfect stocking filler and last minute christmas crochet gift to work on this time of year > this pattern is an ad free clearly > formatted pdf instant download that > is also available for free on my blog here 1 what s included a five-page pdf written in us terms pattern support of you need or would like it more details difficulty is intermediate measurements to fit most average size feet uk size 4-8 materials debbie bliss rialto luxury sock 2 - 1 ball of roskilde alternative yarn felici fingering 3 by wecrochet 3mm us c/2 or d/3 crochet hook 4 tapestry needle scissors stitch markers if desired please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal and commercial use to make and sell your finished items credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the pattern the designer makes no warranties of any kind either express
